attributes.action: ensure that gordon brown does not resign and continues to act as the UK prime minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a petition to ensure that gordon brown does not resign and continues to act as the UK prime minister. show that you fully support gordon brown and the tough decisions he makes on a daily basis during these hard economic times.  people criticise him and blame him for circumstance that are outwith his control and were already in motion before he came into power, lets stand united and show support for one of the hardest working polititions the UK has ever seen. Jay Duployen

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
